pathAssistantSteps.info:
At Investigation, the objective is to assess if there is an opportunity and convert the lead into a contact, an account and/or an opportunity.


• The lead is not mature enough/ right time to present an opportunity to Imerys. Convert into an account and a contact and continue monitoring for potential/future opportunities.

• There is an opportunity however due to the scale, it will be handled by a distributor and only a contact and account will be created.

• There is an opportunity, the lead will be converted into a contact, account and opportunity. A sale manager to be the opportunity owner.


Note that to convert the lead into an opportunity, the account manager has to be a sales person. In addition, to convert to an existing opportunity, request read and write access from the relevant opportunity owner before proceeding.


Click on the ""Convert"" button to progress the lead.

A lead may have been created from a trade show, webinar, website, etc. Basic information on the lead have been collected. At "New" stage, the objective is to assess if the lead is applicable/relevant to Imerys. If relevant, to continuing collecting information on the contact/account.


If applicable/relevant to imerys:


• Verify the information provided. If the information collected is inaccurate, if the lead is uncontactable or is a competitor, discard the lead.


• Check for duplicates. If a duplicate is found, assess if the record should be merged. To merge, please contact smiles.support@imerys.com.


• Continue to collect information on the lead through market research / call to the contact, fill in the input fields with additional information about the company and the contact.


• [If relevant] Assign leads to the right Sales / Marketing people.
